changelog.title: New client numbering system
description: New client numbering system, now working as in client area.

changelog.title: Fixed bug inserting customers
description: Fixed bug where error request showed empty or with value '1'.
Fixed bug where customer with empty vat would throw error.

changelog.title: Minor fixes
description: Fixed bug where error request showed empty or with value '1'.

changelog.title: Added email support
description: Now documents can be sent to customers by email automatically.

changelog.title: Fixed documents payment methods
description: Fixed a bug were the payment method of the order was not the same as the one added to the document.

changelog.title: Added support for WebHooks
description: You can now automate the synchronization of Moloni items and stock to your Prestashop store

changelog.title: General fixes
description: Fix error 500 when creating a document and fix invoice + receipt throwing error despite creating document as intended

changelog.title: Beta Release
description: Plugin beta release for Moloni ES and Prestashop
